name: Mr.Babloo Wants To Run
description:
• Tap/Click to jump or double jump to eat healthy food like, Apple, Bananna, Grapes, they help Mr.Babloo run faster.
  • Avoid junk food such as, Pizza, Burger and Fries, they slow down Mr.Babloo's running speed.
  • Collect a Timer collectible to gain 10 grace seconds.
